SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(create_date) = CURDATE() THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS today_partner, COUNT(*) AS total_partner FROM PARTNER
SELECT COUNT(*) AS unanswer_count FROM QUESTION WHERE answer_yn = 'N'

SELECT COUNT(*) AS recent_reservation, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVATION WHERE payment_status = 'R' AND DATE(reservation_date) BETWEEN CURDATE() - INTERVAL 7 DAY AND CURDATE()) AS cancel_reservation FROM RESERVATION WHERE DATE(reservation_date) BETWEEN CURDATE() - INTERVAL 7 DAY AND CURDATE()

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN area = 'BUSAN' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS busan, SUM(CASE WHEN area = 'GANGNEUNG' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS gangneung, SUM(CASE WHEN area = 'JEJU' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS jeju, SUM(CASE WHEN area = 'SEOUL' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS seoul, SUM(CASE WHEN area = 'YEOSU' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS yeosu FROM PARTNER WHERE approval_status = 'Y'

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN area = 'BUSAN' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS busan, SUM(CASE WHEN area = 'GANGNEUNG' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS gangneung, SUM(CASE WHEN area = 'JEJU' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS jeju, SUM(CASE WHEN area = 'SEOUL' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS seoul, SUM(CASE WHEN area = 'YEOSU' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS yeosu FROM LOCATION WHERE type = 'A'

SELECT p.idx AS partner_idx, p.name, p.address, (SELECT url FROM IMAGE WHERE type = 'P' AND mapping_idx = p.idx AND thumbnail_yn = 'Y') AS image FROM PARTNER p WHERE p.info_yn = 'Y' AND p.approval_status = 'Y' ORDER BY p.create_date DESC, p.name LIMIT 3
